summary: Dental/healthcare website project with premium modern design
architectural_notes: Homepage features a Services section with large premium service cards (not small icon boxes)
Service cards include: title, 2-3 line description, primary CTA button, optional icon, proper spacing
Desktop layout: 2 cards per row in spacious grid with equal heights
Mobile layout: single column stacked full-width cards with large touch-friendly CTAs
Card design: rounded corners (16-20px), soft shadow, light background, premium spacing
Interactions: smooth scroll reveal animation, hover lift effect, shadow increase on hover, 0.3s transitions
CTA buttons: rounded pill style with brand color background and subtle hover scale
Typography hierarchy: large bold titles, softer description color, prominent CTA visibility
Design constraints: maintain existing brand colors, preserve overall layout structure, no AI-generated images

existing_features.title: Restructure the Services section on the homepage with a centered heading 'Our Services' followed by a short 1-line supporting text below it

Replace existing small icon boxes with large premium service cards, where each card displays: service title (bold, prominent), 2-3 line meaningful description, primary CTA button (Book Appointment / Learn More), optional small icon above title, and proper padding and spacing

Style service cards with rounded corners (16-20px border radius), soft shadow depth, light background or subtle section contrast, clean premium spacing, and typography hierarchy with large bold titles, softer colored descriptions, and clearly visible CTAs
Implement desktop layout with 2 service cards per row in a spacious grid with equal height cards, and add hover effects including slight lift, shadow increase, and CTA button highlight
Implement mobile layout with single column stacked cards at full width, large touch-friendly CTA buttons, and clean vertical spacing
Add micro interactions including smooth scroll reveal animation for service cards, hover lift animation, button subtle glow effect, and 0.3s smooth transitions throughout
Style CTA buttons with rounded pill design, brand color background, subtle hover scale effect, and optional clean icon
